about_the_game:
Battle a sultry incubus, a snarling manticore, and even the Norse god Thor with the Last Boss Pack Vol.6! Gee-kun-soft is back with more battlers in their Last Boss series, this time bringing you gods and monsters inspired by Japanese, Ancient Greek, European and Norse mythology for your heroes to fight. This pack has 10 new bosses to choose from, with front view enemies, character sprites, and unique battlebacks for each so you can make each boss battle memorable!

This pack also includes 62 bonus pictures with the enemies placed in their battlebacks with damaged and attacking versions so you can have cut-ins during battles or show a cool cutscene after defeating the boss! And that’s not all, high-resolution PSD files for every enemy are also included so you can make your own versions of each battler depending on what special attack it will use next or how injured it is. So if you’ve been looking for more fantasy enemies or want some large furry creatures to wander your maps then pick up the Last Boss Pack Vol.6!

Contents:

* Battlers and backgrounds for your boss encounters!
* 10 battlers with spritesheet
* 10 Battle background in both 816x624 and 1000x740 sizes
* 10 battler .psd files included for better battle action! (you need editing software to use these files, editing software not included)
* Bonus graphics with battlers and backgrounds together! (64 sheets!)


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
